summary: Hereward, a novice monk, must deliver the Holy Gospel of Lindisfarne to the safety of the Iona monastery, while being pursued by a Viking death squad hell-bent on its capture.
cast: Gareth John Bale|Ian Dicks|Richard Elfyn|Lindsey Fickling|Paul Gamble|Huw Garmon|Christopher Godwin|Gareth Groombridge|Ioan Hefin|Aled Humphreys|Rob Jackson|Richard James|Michael Jibson|Paul Jibson|Mark Lewis Jones|Fraser Maclennan|Gary Mavers|Jason May|Darren Mitchell|Wayne Morgan|Duncan Morris-Metcalfe|John Paget|Sarah Parks|Marc Pickering|Mike Rees|Simon Rees|Elen Rhys|Joshua Richards|Will Scott|Peter Sexton|Richard Shackley|Dereck Shipway|Martyn Smythe|Thomas Straw|Nathan Sussex|Mathew Thomas|Gerald Tyler|Darren Webber|Steve Williams
title: A Viking Saga: The Darkest Day
